scenes.description: Coco asks her seniors (Hololive Gen 0) for their first impressions of her.
Sakura Miko shares her first impression, focusing on 'Morning Coco'.
Hoshimachi Suisei recalls the 'building crushing' scene from Coco's debut stream.
Tokino Sora discusses Coco's physical size and her impressive English skills.
The group discusses Coco's interactions with Gen 0 members.
AZKi talks about being moved by Coco's English translation of 'Shiny Smily Story'.
Coco expresses her gratitude to her seniors for reaching out to her.
Miko is moved to tears by Coco's words, leading to a comedic exchange.

subtitles.original: まあ、私のね...
subtitles.english: Well, mine...

subtitles.original: 第一印象なんかちょっとそういうところから聞いていきたいななんて思っているんですけれども...
subtitles.english: I thought I'd start with your first impressions of me.

subtitles.original: 先輩方、どうでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Well, what were they?

subtitles.original: お？
subtitles.english: Oh?

subtitles.original: 我こそはという人挙手なさってください。どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Who wants to go first? Raise your hand! Come on!

subtitles.original: はい！はいはいはいはい！
subtitles.english: Me! Me! Me! Me!

subtitles.original: はいはい、さくらみこ、どうぞ。
subtitles.english: Very well, Sakura Miko. Go ahead.

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Right!

subtitles.original: まずね、みこの会長への第一印象といえば...
subtitles.english: Well, one of my earliest memories of the Chairman...

subtitles.original: やっぱり朝ココなんですよね。
subtitles.english: ...has got to be Morning Coco.

subtitles.original: あー、確かにね。朝ココね。
subtitles.english: Right, of course!

subtitles.original: 朝ココは本当、え、朝に配信するのっていう驚きとともに...
subtitles.english: First, I was so surprised that you'd do a morning stream.

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ作り込んでたりとか、ぶっ飛んでたりとか...
subtitles.english: Plus, the production values were so high and the subject matter so insane...

subtitles.original: うん、うん。
subtitles.english: Uh-huh.

subtitles.original: もあるんだけどやっぱり、その中で、あ、根は真面目なんだなとか、しっかりしてんなっていうところがすごく伝わった...
subtitles.english: But most of all, it made me realize how dedicated and responsible you were at heart.

subtitles.original: 会長の良さが100%伝わったいい番組だったなって思います。
subtitles.english: I think it was a great show that showcased everything great about you.

subtitles.original: わかるー！
subtitles.english: Yeah, totally!

subtitles.original: 結構なんか初配信からパンチが効いてたと思うんだけど。
subtitles.english: You were always pushing boundaries, even from your debut stream.

subtitles.original: 本当ですか？
subtitles.english: You think so?

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: 誰もやってないことやってるって感じだったと思う。
subtitles.english: You were doing things no one had ever done before.

subtitles.original: そうそうそうそう。
subtitles.english: Yeah, exactly.

subtitles.original: 私が初配信見てすげえ爆笑したのは...
subtitles.english: What really cracked me up during your debut stream...

subtitles.original: お尻が大きすぎてビルを潰しちゃったんです、みたいな...
subtitles.english: ...was the part where you were like, your butt was so big, you crushed a building.

subtitles.original: バーン！そうです、そうです。潰したからね。
subtitles.english: Smash! Yeah, that's right.

subtitles.original: 何言ってるんだろうと思って。すごい面白くて、すごい面白い子来たなと思ってて。
subtitles.english: It was so out of left field that I totally cracked up. I thought that this new girl's a riot!

subtitles.original: で、そらちゃんとかどう思った？初配信見て。
subtitles.english: So, what did you think of her debut, Sora-chan?

subtitles.original: あ、気になる。
subtitles.english: Ooh, I wanna know!

subtitles.original: なんか、いろんな意味で大きいなと思ったのが最初の印象で。
subtitles.english: Well, my first impression was, she's really big in a lot of ways.

subtitles.original: 背も大きいし...
subtitles.english: Not only is she tall...

subtitles.original: 大きいです、はい。
subtitles.english: I'm big, all right!

subtitles.original: まあ大きいし...
subtitles.english: Right, she's really big...

subtitles.original: で、なおかつドラゴンっていうことで。
subtitles.english: And on top of that, she's a dragon!

subtitles.original: すごっ、面白い子が来たなと思ったし。
subtitles.english: So she really caught my attention.

subtitles.original: やっぱり今までと違って新しいなと思ったのは...
subtitles.english: But most of all, the one thing we'd never seen before...

subtitles.original: ネイティブな英語が達者すぎて。
subtitles.english: ...was her perfect, native English.

subtitles.original: 確かに。
subtitles.english: That's for sure.

subtitles.original: 確かにな。そうだな。
subtitles.english: That's true.

subtitles.original: いやもう、すごいなって思ったイメージがすごい強かった。
subtitles.english: All in all, I was just really impressed.

subtitles.original: そうですね。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: いや、やっぱね、0期生ってあんまり絡む機会ここちなかったと思うんだけど。
subtitles.english: So Cocochi, you didn't get as many chances to interact with Gen 0.

subtitles.original: あずきちゃんとかとはどうだった？絡みとかは。
subtitles.english: Like, did you ever get a chance to talk to AZKi-chan?

subtitles.original: あ、でもAZKi先輩ともね、二人でコラボさせていただいたこともありましたし。
subtitles.english: Oh, but we did a collab together, right?

subtitles.original: そうそうそう。
subtitles.english: That's right!

subtitles.original: あのね、ココ会長のあの、Shiny Smily Storyあるじゃないですか。
subtitles.english: See, I was really moved when I heard...

subtitles.original: あれの英訳の歌詞がめちゃくちゃすごい感動して。
subtitles.english: ...Chairman Coco's English lyrics for "Shiny Smily Story."

subtitles.original: その歌詞をAZKiも歌わせてくださいって一回連絡をして。
subtitles.english: So I got in touch and said I wanted to sing those lyrics, too.

subtitles.original: そらしたらもう快く、歌詞をすぐさま送ってきてくれて。
subtitles.english: And without a moment's hesitation, she sent them to me.

subtitles.original: そのエピソードとか忘れられないです。
subtitles.english: I still remember that fondly.

subtitles.original: 私こそ、それ、すごく嬉しかったんですよ。
subtitles.english: I was also really flattered to hear from you!

subtitles.original: 英語のやつがすごい好きだから歌いたいなって言ってくださいまして。
subtitles.english: I couldn't believe you liked the English version so much that you wanted to sing it.

subtitles.original: えっ！？って。
subtitles.english: I was like, "What?!"

subtitles.original: まさかのAZKi先輩がね、配信で歌ってくださるとは思わず。
subtitles.english: I never thought that the AZKi-senpai would sing my lyrics on stream.

subtitles.original: 皆さん聞きましたか？いや、最高っすよ、あれ。
subtitles.english: Have you guys listened to it? It slaps.

subtitles.original: 私がね、卒業していなくなっても、ぜひあれ英語、英語の歌詞をぜひ歌っていただきたいななんて...
subtitles.english: I hope you guys will keep on singing those lyrics even after I'm gone.

subtitles.original: 歌うよ！
subtitles.english: We will. Of course, we'll sing it!

subtitles.original: お願いします！
subtitles.english: Please do!

subtitles.original: 皆さんね、本当に、結構雲の上の存在というか、私にとっては...
subtitles.english: To me, it always felt like you guys were in a class of your own.

subtitles.original: 先輩オブ先輩じゃないですか。
subtitles.english: I mean, you're the OGs, after all.

subtitles.original: だからちょっと、かなり敬うレベル高かったんで...
subtitles.english: I was so in awe of you guys...

subtitles.original: なかなかね、自分からどんどん行けないというところが正直あったんですけど。
subtitles.english: ...that it was honestly hard for me to approach you.

subtitles.original: それでも、先輩方から関係なく、ガンガン絡みに来てくれたんで。
subtitles.english: But you guys were so proactive about approaching me.

subtitles.original: 本当にそこは、今でもとっても感謝しております。
subtitles.english: To this day, I'm truly grateful for that.

subtitles.original: いやー、嬉しいよ。
subtitles.english: Gosh, I'm so touched.

subtitles.original: なんか、みこ、こんなに敬ってもらうこと初めてだからさ。
subtitles.english: I've never had someone look up to me like that.

subtitles.original: そんな大先輩とか言われたら...
subtitles.english: Calling me an OG and all...

subtitles.original: どうしたどうした？
subtitles.english: You okay, there?

subtitles.original: 本当に嬉しい...
subtitles.english: It makes me so happy...

subtitles.original: あれ、泣いてる？泣いてる？
subtitles.english: Uh, are you crying? Are those tears?

subtitles.original: 会長だけだよ、そんなこと言ってくれるの、会長...
subtitles.english: You're the only one who sees me that way, Chairman!

subtitles.original: あ、すみません。今の話の中には、みこ先輩含まれてないっすね。
subtitles.english: Oh, I should clarify. What I said earlier doesn't include you, Miko-senpai.

subtitles.original: なんでだよ！
subtitles.english: Wait, why?! How come?!

subtitles.original: みこ先輩はちょっと、なんというか、容赦なくいじっていい人みたいになってます。すみません。
subtitles.english: Miko-senpai, you're just... I have no qualms about teasing you mercilessly, Miko-senpai.

subtitles.original: すみません。
subtitles.english: My apologies.

subtitles.original: なんでだよ！
subtitles.english: Why?!

subtitles.original: そらそう。そらそうだよね。
subtitles.english: No doubt about it. But it's true.

subtitles.original: そらそうじゃねえよ！
subtitles.english: Have some doubt!

subtitles.original: なんか、3D来たときも、だいぶインパクトがあったイメージがある、ロボ子は。
subtitles.english: And I really remember your 3D debut leaving a big impression on me.

subtitles.original: 確かに！
subtitles.english: Yeah, definitely!

subtitles.original: こう、首ぐぐぐってなったりね。
subtitles.english: Your neck was like "bam, bam, bam."

subtitles.original: 腰ぐぐぐってなったりね。
subtitles.english: And your hips were like "bam, bam, bam" as well.

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: いやー、動きうますぎ、ぶっ飛んで一番やばいよ、その動きは。
subtitles.english: Why're you so good at that? Those moves are just too much!

subtitles.original: すげえ、エンターテイナーだわ。
subtitles.english: You're such an entertainer!

subtitles.original: これが、できなくなるっていうのはね。なので今のうちに皆さん、好きなだけ見といてください。
subtitles.english: I won't be able to do this anymore, so please enjoy it now while you still can!
